verses.roman:
eka-sera anna rāndhi' kariha samarpaṇa
tāhā khāñā tomāra saṅge kariba gamana

synonyms: eka-sera—one kilogram; anna—of rice; rāndhi'-cooking; kariha—do; samarpaṇa—offering; tāhā—that; khāñā—eating; tomāra—of you; saṅge—in the company; kariba—I shall do; gamana—walking.
translation: "Cook one kilogram of rice daily and offer it. I shall eat that rice and follow behind you."
